name: Hidden Symbols in Media and Governance
description: Analyzing the use of death cult symbology in mass media, corporate logos, government institutions, and elite organizations.

cards.title: The Language of Symbols
cards.description: Understanding how symbols are used to manipulate subconscious behavior and create ideological conditioning.
bulletpoints: Identifying common occult symbols used in mainstream media.
Understanding the historical roots and evolution of elite symbology.
Analyzing how repeated exposure to symbols reinforces programming.

cards.title: Decoding Corporate and Government Emblems
cards.description: Examining the hidden messages embedded in government seals, corporate logos, and institutional branding.
bulletpoints: Identifying Masonic, Illuminati, and occultic imagery in global governance.
Deciphering the use of numerology and sacred geometry in elite symbolism.
Understanding how colors and archetypal imagery influence mass perception.

cards.title: Symbolic Rituals in Mass Media Events
cards.description: Analyzing the occult nature of large-scale televised events and how they shape public consciousness.
bulletpoints: Examining Super Bowl Halftime Shows, Olympic Ceremonies, and political inaugurations for ritualistic elements.
Understanding how psychological priming is embedded into mass media productions.
Tracking real-world consequences of symbolic mass rituals on public behavior.
